product_name: Custom Correct Custom Correct Lake Crescent, Happy Lake Ridge, Washingon Topo-Map
long_description: A custom correct topographic map of the Lake Crescent, Happy Lake Ridge area of Olympic National Park in Washington State. Provides detailed elevation, trail mileage and navigational information for hiking or exploring the area. Published in 1994; scale 1:64,500 or 1 inch to the mile; topographic interval 100 feet.
short_description: A custom correct topographic map of the Lake Crescent, Happy Lake Ridge area of Olympic National Park in Washington State.
